job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to grasp business requirements and translate them into technical guidance.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand how technical changes affect the broader business and operational landscape.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions the application of generative AI, a core aspect of modeling.
These are specific techniques and components used in building and applying generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
job_tasks.justification: This involves the practical application of technology and design principles in a development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
job_tasks.justification: This describes core software development activities, including building and maintaining systems.
API development is a key part of building software applications.
Involvement with UI/UX development indicates building user-facing applications.
These are foundational tools for containerization and orchestration, essential for MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: Cloud platforms are crucial for deploying and managing AI systems in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the creation of data pipelines, a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documentation is a key part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating diagrams is a form of technical documentation integral to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and exploring new technologies are part of the modeling and development cycle, especially in AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This implies working closely with others and sharing information.

job_tasks.phrase: Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
job_tasks.justification: Presenting and sharing knowledge are clear indicators of communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the utilization and application of generative AI (LLMs, RAG, Agents) for product development. It also includes significant software development tasks like API design, system integration, and working with modern cloud infrastructure, which are core to building production-grade GenAI applications.
